seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching packages for transitions, confidence and ethical experiments.

hero.title: Three coaching pathways, one ethical stance
hero.subtitle: Each package holds space for nuance, keeps you in charge and stays within ICF practice.

overview.title: What stays consistent
overview.subtitle: Coaching with us is a structured conversation and a place to design careful experiments. It is not therapy, consulting or emergency support.
overview.description: Every package begins with a 20-minute intro call so we can confirm scope, consent and boundaries together.
bullets: ICF-aligned coaching with clear agreements and confidentiality.
Sessions held online unless we mutually agree otherwise.
You lead the agenda; we bring questions, structure and reflection.

boundary.title: Clear boundaries we uphold
boundary.body: You stay responsible for decisions and follow-up actions. We name when another professional or resource is a better fit.
bullets: No immigration, legal, medical or financial advice.
We do not act on your behalf or guarantee outcomes.
We honour confidentiality within ICF ethics and safeguarding law.

packages.title: Choose the focus that fits
packages.description: Each card links to a detailed page with boundaries, reflection prompts and next steps.

cards.title: Transition package
cards.summary: A steadier container when relocation or role change feels like too many plates at once.
cards.for: For professionals navigating relocation or role change.
cards.focus: Clarify what a good move looks like and design grounded experiments.

cards.title: Confidence & voice
cards.summary: Build a voice you trust without copying dominant styles or ignoring nuance.
cards.for: For leaders or collaborators who want to speak with steadiness.
cards.focus: Unpack narratives, practise consent-based conversations and rehearse real scenarios.

cards.title: Experiments & stewardship
cards.summary: Design ethical tests when your choices ripple across people, data or community.
cards.for: For people stewarding change that affects teams or communities.
cards.focus: Design ethical experiments, set decision gates and keep agency with stakeholders.

process.title: How we begin
process.description: A light structure keeps you informed while leaving space to adapt.
bullets: Intro call: confirm needs, scope and whether coaching is right for now.
Co-created agreement: cadence, language, between-session support.
Regular reviews so we can adjust pace or close when goals are met.

faq.title: Questions before you decide
faq.intro: These respond to practical and ethical considerations. You can read the full FAQ anytime.

cta.title: Need help choosing?
cta.body: Share a few lines about what’s happening. We’ll suggest a starting point or signpost other support.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
